docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Building an end to end Data Science project.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Building docs using mkdocs
docs.text:
1. First install mkdocs pip install mkdocs-material
  2. Create a new mkdocs webpage mkdocs new .
  3. Run the server mkdocs serve

docs.title: Mkdocs Documentation
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs page.

    return None

docs.title: Project Architecture
docs.text: This is the Architecture for the end to end DS project.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Technologies Used:

docs.title: Data Flow
docs.text: Description of how data flows through the system. Diagrams or flowcharts illustrating data flow between components. Explanation of data formats, protocols, and APIs used for communication.

docs.title: Deployment Architecture
docs.text: Overview of the deployment architecture (e.g., server infrastructure, cloud services). Description of deployment environments (e.g., development, staging, production). Configuration details for deployment tools and platforms.

docs.title: Testing Strategy
docs.text: Description of the testing approach used in the project. Explanation of unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing strategies. Guidelines for writing and running tests.

docs.title: Performance and Scalability
docs.text: Discussion of performance considerations and optimization techniques. Explanation of how the architecture supports scalability and handles load.

docs.title: Security Considerations
docs.text: Overview of security measures implemented in the architecture. Explanation of authentication, authorization, encryption, and other security features. Guidelines for secure coding practices.

docs.title: Development Workflow
docs.text: Description of the development workflow used by the team (e.g., version control, code review process). Guidelines for contributing to the project and submitting pull requests. Links to relevant documentation and resources for developers.
